non_residential_details.development_type: Change of Use with Extension(s) over 999sqm

description: Alterations and extensions to create an 8 storey building comprising 286 sq metres (1 unit) for either use class A1 (retail), A2 (financial and professional services) , A3 (restaurant/cafe), B1 (business), D1 (non residential institution) or D2 (assembly and leisure), 565 sq metres (1 unit) for class A3 (restaurant/cafe) and 66 residential units with landscaped service area
